nodes.text: Halite was an ore mined for salt found on Crait.

Halite is a real-world mineral mined for salt. It was first mentioned in a Star Wars context in the 1990 Star Wars Legends RPG sourcebook Galaxy Guide 6: Tramp Freighters by authors Mark Rein-Hagen and Stewart Wieck. It was first mentioned in canon by Pablo Hidalgo in the Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary from 2017.
